text: <@U7THT3TM3> <https://github.com/tlienart/Franklin.jl/issues/803> there's a quick fix in there (disabling the prerendering); also <@UBVKC24EA> kindly PRed a fix which is on master but not yet released

kindly PRed a fix which is on master but not yet released

text: Thanks! Any chance of getting a quick 0.10.34 release with this fix?

elements.text: Thanks! Any chance of getting a quick 0.10.34 release with this fix?

text: done, I was reluctant to do it as I'd really like to sort out the RSS mess but fair enough this was annoying too

elements.text: done, I was reluctant to do it as I'd really like to sort out the RSS mess but fair enough this was annoying too

text: Won't upgrading to v11 solve this? Is there something non trivial moving to v11?

elements.text: Won't upgrading to v11 solve this? Is there something non trivial moving to v11?

text: it's not immediately clear to me what you're asking?

elements.text: it's not immediately clear to me what you're asking?

text:
the highlight thing was released in 0.10.34; the RSS fix is ongoing and will be in 0.10.35. All these are patch fixes so not minor release.

If you're asking about Franklin v0.11 the core goal for it is to integrate the new parser work that will enable PDF generation (among other things). I'm not sure when that will be finished but it'll take me some time.
